body.name: Evolur Cruise Rider Stroller with Canopy, Lightweight Umbrella Stroller with Compact Fold, Easy to Carry Travel Stroller - Noir Black
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22. Order within 19 hrs 57 mins
FREE delivery Thursday, February 22. Order within 19 hrs 57 mins
features: COMPACT & COMFORTABLE: The Evolur Cruise Rider Stroller folds inward like a book in seconds, comes with an easy recline feature & can be carried on your shoulder everywhere (Carry Belt included). Comes with a plush seat cover, padded headrest & extendable backrest for taller babies.

SAFE & SECURE: The Cruise Rider Stroller with Canopy comes with a 5-point safety harness and meets/exceeds the ASTM, CPSC and Federal Flammability standards & is tested for lead and other toxic elements. It also comes with a protective super-large size adjustable & removable Canopy.

FLEXIBLE & FUNCTIONAL: This stroller effortlessly converts into a Scooter & Rider. Comes with a high-density, durable handle & bumper grip (optional closed bumper & T-bar), front wheels with suspension & a one-touch link brake for easy maneuverability.

COMFORT & STYLE: With a plush seat cover, padded headrest and extendable backrest suitable for taller babies, your child is bound to experience maximum comfort. Choose from 3 modern finishes as your child explores the world in style - Cognac, Black & Gray.

PRODUCT CARE & SPECS: The Cruise Rider Stroller with Canopy requires very low maintenance. It can be easily wiped clean with a damp cloth and air dried. Product dimensions: 33L” x 17W” x 38H”. Weight capacity: 45 Lbs. Age group: 10-36 months.
body.description: Let your little one discover the world from the lap of luxury aboard the Evolur Cruise Rider Stroller with Canopy! A proud winner of the 2023 NAPPA Awards, this one-of-a-kind stroller is loaded with features for those afternoon walks, grocery runs & family outings. This compact stroller folds inwards like a book in seconds, easily reclines & can be carried on your shoulder everywhere (Carry Belt included). With a high-density, durable handle & bumper grip (optional closed bumper & T-bar), front wheels with suspension, and a one-touch link brake, the Cruise Rider Stroller with Canopy is crafted for easy maneuverability. By effortlessly converting to a Scooter & Rider, this innovation-driven stroller combines flexibility and functionality. Safety comes first as this stroller comes with a 5-point safety harness and meets/exceeds ASTM, CPSC & Federal Flammability standards. Maximum comfort for your child with a plush seat, padded headrest & extendable backrest for taller babies. The Cruise Rider Stroller with Canopy comes with accessories like the Cruise Rider Twin Connector, Storage Basket, Rain Cover & a fun Scooter front (All sold separately). Easy to maintain by wiping with a damp cloth & air dry.

productInformation.name: Care instructions
productInformation.value: Do not machine wash or use a hot iron

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Compact and smooth ride
reviews.reviewText: It’s is absolutely perfect for my big boyIt’s compact and lightweight! I love that it has a shade and the seat has a 5 point harness for my kiddo with special needs! I love that I can buy something that’s a bit stylish. We got a lot of compliments on it! The stroller glides very smooth! I was hesitant at first but I do not regret buying this stroller it’s wonderful for quick on the go folds nicely in my car

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Needing a stroller to fit my 7yr old autistic son for Disney world and this one is perfect! It even fits my older kiddo! The shade covering does not hit their heads if you install it correctly. Easy strolls, turns and glides excellent, brakes do their purpose but not the best.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Had this for couple months now and it's working ok so far. I usually use it for quick stops or for appointments only. It's great how compact it is. Thought I would have hard time putting it together and folding it down was a breeze as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Stylish, Easy Maneuverability, Comfortable, Not Sturdy
reviews.reviewText: We bought this stroller for our Vacations in March for our 2.5 years old day . We were worried that she may not be able to keep pace with miles of daily walking . We used it heavily and it was very Comfortable, stylish and Practical option for us. Our daughter loved it. Easy to maneuver, comfortable, smooth ride, not easy to fold and unfold it though . We used it extensively during our travels afterwards. It broke down on our 3rd trip when the stick between 2 wheels came out. Bummer that it was lost during the flight and I can not find replacement parts anywhere making stroller useless. It lasted 5 months only for us.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Terrible stroller. Needs to be recalled ASAP!!!
reviews.reviewText: My daughter fell back-words while sitting on it. At least 10 ppl saw it and one guy came up and asked if she is ok. Thank god we had the top attached and her head didn’t hit the concrete floor but this is not a stable and not a safe stroller for any child. This product needs to be recalled ASAP.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Not just a stroller
reviews.reviewText: I added an armrest table so it can also be a highchair. Sofa Armrest Clip Table Tray,... https://www.amazon.com/dp/B08LLBZW8V?ref=ppx_pop_mob_ap_shareVery convenient and saves space.Very easy to maneuver.Grandson loves it. Versatile and well-made.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful but no instruction on how to stand it
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. So I just purchased it, I think it’s beautiful and all just as excepted. However, I have some buts. First, it’s not so light weight, appears quite heavy for me but I’m still very glad I got it. And secondly, the instruction manual doesn’t say how to stand it back. It tells you how to fold it but not how to get it to stand back up. I’ve been battling with it for a while now and checked all YouTube videos with no help. Anyone could kindly tell me how cuz it’s quite frustrating at this point. I recommend they include that in the manual also. Not all of us are tech savvy. EDIT: I eventually figured it out through the help of a friend almost one year and multiple flights later. lol everywhere we go, even in different countries, people always staring at it and making great comments about it. It’s a show stopper. I’ve re - edited to 5 stars from 4. Thanks for this great masterpiece. It’s still strong as ever

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Muy practico y estético 🥰
reviews.reviewText: Me encanta lo práctico y ligero que es fácilmente lo puedes llevar con una sola mano , además de lo hermoso y diferente ✨
